36#include "windlocl.h"
37#include <assert.h>
38
39static int
40put_char(uint32_t *out, size_t *o, uint32_t c, size_t out_len)
41{
42 if (*o >= out_len)
43 return 1;
44 out[*o] = c;
45 (*o)++;
46 return 0;
47}
48
49int
50_wind_ldap_case_exact_attribute(const uint32_t *tmp,
51 size_t olen,
52 uint32_t *out,
53 size_t *out_len)
54{
55 size_t o = 0, i = 0;
56
57 if (olen == 0) {
58 *out_len = 0;
59 return 0;
60 }
61
62 if (put_char(out, &o, 0x20, *out_len))
63 return WIND_ERR_OVERRUN;
64 while(i < olen && tmp[i] == 0x20) /* skip initial spaces */
65 i++;
66
67 while (i < olen) {
68 if (tmp[i] == 0x20) {
69 if (put_char(out, &o, 0x20, *out_len) ||
70 put_char(out, &o, 0x20, *out_len))
71 return WIND_ERR_OVERRUN;
72 while(i < olen && tmp[i] == 0x20) /* skip middle spaces */
73 i++;
74 } else {
75 if (put_char(out, &o, tmp[i++], *out_len))
76 return WIND_ERR_OVERRUN;
77 }
78 }
79 assert(o > 0);
80
81 /* only one spaces at the end */
82 if (o == 1 && out[0] == 0x20)
83 o = 0;
84 else if (out[o - 1] == 0x20) {
85 if (out[o - 2] == 0x20)
86 o--;
87 } else
88 put_char(out, &o, 0x20, *out_len);
89
90 *out_len = o;
91
92 return 0;
93}
